body.description: Olay gentle clean foaming face cleanser is specially formulated to cleanse, refresh and address the needs of sensitive skin. Take care of delicate skin daily with a fragrance-free formula that thoroughly removes dirt, oil and makeup. The rich, foamy lather leaves skin feeling refreshed. For an everyday gentle clean that keeps you feeling fresh, use Olay gentle clean foaming cleanser.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #10,285 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #162 in Facial Cleansing Washes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Olay cleansers offer a gentle to deep clean and everything in between. The classic line of cleansers is designed to fit the needs of various skin types and concerns. Cleansing daily preps your skin for the rest of your skincare regimen, leaving you and your skin feeling refreshed. Product Description Olay Gentle Clean Foaming Cleanser is specially formulated to cleanse, refresh and address the needs of sensitive skin. Take care of delicate skin daily with a fragrance-free formula that removes 2x more dirt, oil and makeup than the leading beauty bar. The rich, foamy lather leaves skin looking clear and blemish free. For an everyday gentle clean that keeps you feeling fresh, use Olay Gentle Clean Foaming Cleanser. Cleanses away dirt and impurities without causing irritation Removes 2x more dirt, oil and makeup 100% fragrance-free cleanser formula A gentle clean for sensitive skin types 7 fl oz tube

Just because it’s gentle, doesn’t make it less effective. Gentle Clean Foaming Face Cleanser removes 2x more dirt, oil and makeup than the leading beauty bar. It cleanses, refreshes and exfoliates the surface of the skin without using harsh chemicals or scrubs. Use to prepare skin before applying your Olay treatments and moisturizers. Gentle Clean Foaming Face Cleanser for sensitive skin is specifically formulated for the special needs of sensitive skin. Its glycerin base cleanses and exfoliates skin of impurities without causing irritation. Its hypoallergenic, oil-free, fragrance-free, and soap-free formula ensures a mild clean for everyday use on sensitive skin. Olay Gentle Clean Foaming Cleanser is just one of many beneficial steps you can take to improve your skin’s appearance. Customize your own refreshing regimen with Olay cleansers, serums, eye/specialty treatments to target specific skincare concerns, and moisturizers.

Q: Can I use the Gentle Clean Foaming Cleanser daily? A: Yes, its gentle enough for everyday use. Q: Can all skin types use the Gentle Clean Foaming Cleanser? A: Olay Gentle Clean Foaming Cleanser is formulated for sensitive skin types. Q: When do I use the Gentle Clean Foaming Cleanser? A: Use daily, or when needed, to cleanse and refresh skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does what is advertised, I have used this product for years and it never disappoints. It's foamy and leaves my skin feeling silky clean. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this OLAY gentle, foaming face wash!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this gentle, foaming face wash for sensitive skin for over 20 years now. I have very sensitive skin and it has never irritated my skin or eyes. It takes off everything, even the waterproof mascara! Olay keeps the price low and affordable so I have been a loyal customer! It is fragrance free and leaves my face nice and soft, not dry and stripped of natural oils. I highly recommend Olay Cleanse Gentle Foaming Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin, Fragrance Free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the skin, but the pumps rarely work. Very annoying
reviews.reviewText: Great cleanser, gentle, but the pumps are almost always broken

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash! I didn’t think I would find a replacement for Aveeno ultra calming foaming face wash. I tried 8 or 9 other “gentle/sensitive” face washes. Thought I would have to settle for second choice. I came across Olay’s gentle face wash by accident and I am so glad! Because this exceeds even Aveeno’s wash. Olay’s wash leaves my skin so soft and smooth, even removes eye makeup without any burning. Needs just one pump onto wet hands to make a foam. So the value is amazing opposed to Aveeno’s which is mostly water(it took 5 to 6 pumps to remove makeup). I also realized that Aveeno actually left my skin feeling a little tight. I felt a little pulling when I smiled. I immediately bought another set and will toss my last bottle of Aveeno which I was hoarding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best GENTLE face soap!
reviews.reviewText: I love the thickness, suds, and GENTLENESS that this face wash provides. It's quick, easy and it works. My local store always is out, so this three (3) pack is a good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love it!
reviews.reviewText: Very gentle on my skin. Love it

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I only use Olay Face Cleanser on my face
reviews.reviewText: Keeps your skin hydrated while cleaning your face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used it for decades. Works great.
Es un jabón muy suave con el cutis, me encanta como queda mi piel después de lavarla, muy recomendable

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic face wash - especially for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash. It is now a subscribe and save regular item for me! Washes make up off gently but effectively. Gentle for sensitive skin! I keep one at my sink, one in my shower and one in my camper! So, buying the 2 pack on a regular schedule works well for me! I love that I can do this for cheaper than buying them at the store!
Best cleanser gor oily skin. Have been using it for decades now. Even with age, still the best.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solo llego UN producto de un paquete de TRES!
reviews.reviewText: He comprado este producto varios veces en el pasado, y me gusta el producto mucho. PERO esta vez solo llego UN producto - y el pedido fue para un paquete de TRES. Quiero los dos productos que faltan, o voy a devolver el producto.
I love this facial cleanser as it’s gentle and didn’t ddry my skin at all...I will buy it again in the future
